sentence.Network_en: Set the tracking force dial to the zero detent position.
sentence.Network_cn: 将针压钮调到零的位置.

sentence.Network_en: General detent. Engaged or disengaged can be specified.
sentence.Network_cn: 常规制动销. 可指定为已占用或未占用.

sentence.Network_en: Aldrin: OK. Engine stop. ACA out of Detent.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿尔德林: OK. 引擎停止.ACA制动脱离.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (denoting a catch in clocks and watches): from French détente, from Old French destente, from destendre 'slacken', from des- (expressing reversal) + Latin tendere 'to stretch'

means.word_mean: 1. a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
